docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 🍽️ Welcome to the Collaborative Cookbook! A community-driven collection of recipes from around the world — built by contributors like you. 🌍 Explore Recipes Indian Desserts ✨ Want to Contribute? Add your own recipe via Pull Request ! Made with ❤️ and MkDocs
